abstract: Warren E. Buffett, who has called for higher taxes on the rich, took aim at a Wall Street Journal editorial that called his Bank of America investment a “tax-avoidance triumph.”
snippet: Warren E. Buffett, who has called for higher taxes on the rich, took aim at a Wall Street Journal editorial that called his Bank of America investment a “tax-avoidance triumph.”
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett has a bone to pick with The Wall Street Journal.

headline.main: Buffett Defends Tax Bill on Bank of America Deal

abstract: Several homeowners filed suit in a federal court, seeking to block a proposed $8.5 billion settlement between Bank of America and major mortgage investors.
snippet: Several homeowners filed suit in a federal court, seeking to block a proposed $8.5 billion settlement between Bank of America and major mortgage investors.

headline.main: Bank of America Settlement Faces Growing Challenges

abstract: Nevada’s attorney general wants to end a broad mortgage agreement it struck with Bank of America in 2008.
snippet: Nevada’s attorney general wants to end a broad mortgage agreement it struck with Bank of America in 2008.
lead_paragraph: The attorney general of Nevada is accusing Bank of America of repeatedly violating a broad loan modification agreement it struck with state officials in October 2008 and is seeking to rip up the deal so that the state can proceed with a suit against the bank over allegations of deceptive lending, marketing and loan servicing practices.

headline.main: Nevada Says Bank Broke Mortgage Settlement
headline.print_headline: Nevada Sees Violations Of Mortgage Agreement
